team.name: H.P.D.D.M. Wickramasinghe
team.description: Led the development of the Execution Phase Detection module, focusing on real-time temporal analysis of volatile memory artifacts. Achieved 94.50% detection accuracy on CIC-MalMem-2022 dataset.

team.name: D.L.K.L. Gangaboda
team.description: Specialized in the Delivery Vector Analysis module, developing a hybrid deep learning model using Bi-Directional LSTM for phishing and malicious email detection. Attained 98.98% validation accuracy.

team.name: N.H.S. Chandrasekara
team.description: Focused on Reconnaissance Detection, implementing an adaptive DBSCAN-based anomaly detection system to identify subtle network probing and scanning activities with high-precision early detection.
team.achievement: High-precision early detection with minimal false-positive rate
